divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a crystal clear, very warm night. No clouds in the sky and the stars were numerious. I was outside at the edge of my driveway heading back towards the house. It was 3:46am and the distance from the street to my house is about the length of 3 mid-size cars. Anyway I was about halfway to the house when I felt compelled to look up. When I looked up, this object whatever it was, was almost right over me. It looked like a huge bright flash of light or something like a spotlight and it lasted almost as soon as I noticed it. That light then faded and I saw this faint red colored star looking thing move in a southward direction and as it moved, it kept getting fainter and fainter to see. I watched till it disappeard. The entire sighting lasted about 30 to 35 seconds. I thought this was weird, seeing this but it isn't the first time I've seen this sort of thing before. In a way I feel honored and it has me wondering.
Summary: I was outside and felt compelled to look up and in doing so saw a bright flash of light and the light turned faint red and slowly disappeared.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Meridianville
